Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: As for AI and open banking, what exactly does the term open banking represent in this context?

Author: DashingCrypto
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hey Nightz, I found this definition which might illuminate the subject:  Quote "Open banking is a financial services term as part of financial technology that refers to: The use of open APIs that enable third-party developers to build applications and services around the financial institution. Greater financial transparency options for account holders ranging from open data to private data." - source: Wikipedia  If you have any questions about Eligma, please join the Official Telegram Group!

Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We are asked often "Do I get any discounts with Elipay? "  The answer is a big YES - every time and everywhere you shop! Elipay gives you a 2% token back for every purchase, in our own ELI tokens, which you can spend on further purchases. Check out this article for all the details: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eli-is-now-a-mainstream-utility-token-88a99346e522?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=elipay_crypto_news_and_locations&utm_term=2019-02-01

Author: HODLtheLINE
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Tired of loyalty cards? Here’s Elipay loyalty on blockchain  Loyalty programs are one of the most frequent strategies used by stores and service providers to get customers to return. They are offered by most stores, which makes them very frequent, but also impractical at the same time. See how Eligma is contributing to smart commerce development in this field.

Author: heelanwa
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma is developing a platform that will make your selection faster with AI-searches through all the websites at once. Its other features will enable you to make an inventory of what you own, monitor the value of your items, suggest the best time to sell them and easily list them on selling sites for resale if you wish. Such solutions support the general awareness that assets should circulate effectively, and cater to our challenging economic times: with Eligma’s solution, every household will be able to participate in a buying/selling process that saves time and money, and turn redundant items into a source of additional income.  Learn more here https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligma-the-lean-startup-the-customer-as-the-main-compass-c77a68220d69

Author: Ascoldtut
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Indeed, the roadmap is in the process of being updated, the next significant target will be launching Elipay in the UK next year. Geographical expansion to the UK market begins in June 2019 (prior to worldwide release), that is going to be a huge step which will allow Eligma to go further! At this stage, Elipay supports payments with ELI, BTC, BCH and ETH. Other currencies will be added as per community demand - there is already developed support that will enable integration of ERC-20 tokens.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: A Groundbreaking Mobile App Elipay to Enable Simple Payments with Crypto for Everyone  In 2018, the largest Slovenian shopping mall, BTC City, announced its plans to become a ‘Genuine Bitcoin City’ and add cryptocurrencies as a means of payment in its shops. To make this plan come true, the Eligma company designed a cryptocurrency transaction system called “Elipay”. In September, the Elipay mobile app was launched in Slovenia, with the international market to follow.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/groundbreaking-mobile-app-elipay-to-enable-simple-payments-with-crypto-for-everyone/

Author: kvanier
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma is a platform that will change the way people buy, track and resell products. It has advanced discovery feature that will enable to search for best suited products for a user and also offer user with a suitable alternatives. The inventory feature will help users track the products they own and tell them what the value of that product is and how that value is going to behave in the future. It will advise the optimum time to sell or replace the product and offer would be posted through simple interface if decided so. Eligma will be a holistic solution, a "'one stop shop" to do all the purchases from one place, as it will offer unified global shopping account, meaning you will be able to buy products at any online store only with using Eligma. If willing, users will be able to complete the purchase also with crypto even though if that particular store is not accepting them yet. To round everything up, ELI tokens will be used to establish a united loyalty program, meaning you will be able to purchase at one store and than use loyalty tokens at any other retailer included in the program.  Furthermore, Eligma has developed Elipay, a transaction system that enables customers to purchase goods and services with selected cryptocurrencies at any store that accepts Elipay as a payment option. The process is very simple and not significantly different from shopping in euros. Elipay consists of two parts: (1) a web-based POS that can also be easily integrated, and (2) a mobile application available on iOS and Android.More information can be found at https://elipay.com/

Author: ian_d_uk
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi,  thanks for the interest and support!  AI is certainly not a convenience, it is key to the heart of the Eligma / Elipay platform.  As an AI-driven and blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform that follows holistic approach, Eligma will change the way people discover, purchase, track and resell items online. With its unique features it will offer a “one-place”, where users can shop from all the online stores, check the value of items owned and learn the best time to sell them.  Discovery will use a deep neural network-based product recommendation engine to find the best deals for products users are looking for. It will also propose alternative solutions and enable cryptocurrency payment gateway for all stores connected to the platform. Items purchased through Eligma will get a digital items profile (DIP) that will be stored in our sidechain and its hashes on blockchain.  For more details, see page 9 onwards of the whitepaper: https://www.eligma.io/pdf/eligma-white-paper_v1.9.pdf

Author: kvanier
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma CEO Update  We have created Eligma because we have noticed a problem and would like to solve it. We saw a problem where not many other tech players wished to notice it, and dedicated all of the time, passion and money we possessed to solving this problem with Eligma. We want to nail it. We want to save people’s time and money by optimizing the way people can discover, purchase, track and resell items. This can change dramatically in the future and we wish to make it happen.  In this update you can check out what has been worked on the last 8 months in an overview. You can also check out what is in store for the next 3 months - including EliPay going public September 12! It will be available on iOS and Android.  Regarding EliPay's developments, the Eligma team have covered 54 locations in two short months of testing, which means that the team have signed a contract for a new location on every business day. Over the last two months, Eligma have been mentioned in more than 130 articles worldwide covering Elipay and Bitcoin City. August will mark the beginning of our marketing campaign for Elipay, which is going public in September. You can see much more on EliPay in the full article  Read the full update here and let us know what you think! https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligma-ceo-update-afd7ab3e38e8

Author: Hakamura
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Prior to Eligma, no startup was able to provide users with a single account to interact with several different online stores. Whitepaper is written correctly, but the final success depends on the implementation. The development is designed for several years, which can undermine the confidence of investors in the project. However, holding the AI layer and neural network between e-Commerce platforms gives Eligma a significant advantage over current platforms. Given the rapid development of Internet Commerce, the project solves important problems in this area.

Author: KiyasMahinda
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma was born as a response to several key trends and problems identified in traditional retail as well as online shopping, where the use of the latter has exploded in the recent decade. The goal of our project is to offer a set of previously impossible or unanticipated solutions to discover, purchase, track and resell items. This is now viable thanks to the development of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology.

Author: bkrobottc3
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: With the inventory feature, users will be able to see the AI-predicted current and future item value and then decide when to sell those items. That is how every household will become a business. Eligma will offer various possibilities of using its ELI token for activities performed on the platform. Users will be rewarded for using the token through a universal loyalty system. It will consolidate merchants in an integrated open-loop universal loyalty system and provide a simple and convenient user interface. There will be no need to register with a standalone loyalty program of each merchant. That is awesome

Author: Vinylriff
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: By connecting blockchain and business, we will create a modular platform for commerce and save time that users spend on searching and purchasing products by utilizing artificial intelligence. It will advise users, which item to buy by taking into account item components, quality, price, shipping time and costs as well as other factors. It will enable users to securely and transparently sell their used items on multiple second-hand markets at the most appropriate time through their personal item inventories - Eligma will transform every household into a business. All of this will be possible thanks to the innovative use of existing AI and blockchain technologies.  Check out more at:  https://www.eligma.io/pdf/eligma-white-paper_v1.9.pdf

Author: GT-RR
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Do you remember the purchase of your current box of cereal? Chances are that you don’t. What about the purchase of your current car or washing machine? Of course you do! How could one forget all those decisions and info gathering? The higher the price of a product and/or the greater the desire for a specific quality (e.g. low-cost maintenance), the more active we tend to be in the purchase process.  In case of major buys, which are often technical in nature, the average buyer strives to be well-informed. We invest a lot of research time, and eventually become very clear about the specifications that we would like the product to have. In this, the Internet is a major source of information, and often the preferred source of the item. After knowing all the specifications, a tiring comparison on numerous selling sites used to be the next step. The AI of the Eligma e-commerce platform, however, aims to introduce some fundamental changes, and offer you a hand in finding the very best deal. It will do this in two interconnected ways: with the speed and broadness of its smart mega-search, and with the precision of its trained machine learning algorithms searching precisely for the specifications that you may require.  Eligma’s AI helps find the 100% match  ‘The best deal’ may mean different things in cases of different customers and products. Sometimes, the best deal means ALL the specifications that we enter — all the criteria on our search engine list. We may need an item to be in a certain area or by the brand that we are loyal to. In this case, Eligma’s AI will search millions of online products in a just few seconds to find a 100% match. The broadness of this discovery is very good news, especially on the second-hand market, which has traditionally been known as a business where one simply has to compromise because items with all of one’s specifications do not tend to be available. Eligma’s comprehensive AI discovery, however, definitely aims to call that into question. You might be able to get that exact car colour after all!  More : https://medium.com/eligma-blog/informed-choice-is-the-best-choice-90618b0ac797

Author: aarondes
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We have launched the test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) in beginning of April. MVP is projected for August this year, with the first version of the Eligma platform developed by the end of the year and later expanded to other markets in accordance with roadmap you can find in our whitepaper on pages 49-51: https://bit.ly/2qNngod  Simultaneously different features and modules presented will be added. Currently we are developing the data gathering services (scrappers, API connections,...) as well as machine learning algorithm for product matching and categorization. We also already have the database architecture setup. Our ultimate goal is that eventually all stores within BTC City would support Elipay. We have started our testing phase and are continually adding additional stores. Of course, the bigger picture is to be fully established worldwide. You can check out our roadmap here: https://eligma.io/index.html#roadMap  In following article you can see the development of discovery pillar and also check it on a github: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligmas-minimum-viable-product-demonstration-8611b45dd999  https://github.com/Eligma/Eligma

Author: aarondes
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: 🗣 Check out how Eligma will help both professional sellers and amateurs who want to sell online!  https://medium.com/eligma-blog/e-commerce-is-huge-and-that-is-good-and-bad-2099e2d501c9

Author: aarondes
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We have established a team of senior developers who are focused on setting up, upgrading and maintaining this online store database. Two different approaches will be used for gathering data:  • Connecting to open APIs of online stores; • Developing parsing services to scrape the data from online stores.  To connect online and offline shoppers, Eligma will develop a code scanning open source code to be used use within the Eligma mobile app or through the APIs implemented in any third party application.  https://github.com/Eligma/Eligma/tree/master/DiscoveryEngine/QueryUnderstanding/FeaturePredictors/category  Eligma’s product and online store database will grow exponentially by incorporating additional APIs, adding manual product entries and using machine learning. Database will thus soon become appealing for other companies. They will be able to access Eligma’s database via APIs in accordance with monthly agreements set.

Author: warunaferang
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: The concept of Eligma was born as a response to several key trends and problems identified in traditional retail as well as online shopping, where the use of the latter has exploded in the recent decade. The goal of our project is to offer a set of previously impossible or unanticipated solutions to discover, purchase, track and resell items. This is now viable thanks to the development of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We needed to establish a secure environment for token storage and correct procedures for tracking all incoming transactions. This was a prerequisite before the smart contract can correctly distribute all ELI tokens to our buyers after our crowdsale ends. To make everything transparent, our smart contract will also be publicly published on GitHub for user auditing.  In our Elipay cryptocurrency system we use cold wallets in secure locations for safe storage. We only keep a certain amount of cryptocurrencies on exchanges so that we can complete the necessary transactions. That means that in the unlikely event that our platform gets attacked, the vast majority of the funds is stored safely.   very important and wise for future security of EliPay!

Author: sarmashalom
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Proper reading!   5 reasons to contribute in the Eligma crowdsale Eligma’s public crowdsale is starting tomorrow, so here are 5 key reasons why it will change the face of online shopping forever!  ⦁ Eligma will disrupt a multi-billion-dollar market by offering everything in one place  In 2017 retail e-commerce sales reached 2.304 trillion USD, which represents an almost 25 per cent increase in comparison to 2016. With the expansion of internet access across the globe and technological changes that are making online shopping more convenient and safer, this figure is projected to rise to almost 4.9 trillion USD in 2021. As these figures grow, so does the number of online stores and the problem that Eligma will solve. You will be able to browse and buy in all stores on one platform!   Paying with cryptocurrencies is the next logical step  Since mankind started bartering 100,000 years ago, payment methods have evolved greatly and that has been even more evident in the last 100 years or so. From banknotes to credit cards and mobile transaction systems, payment systems are becoming safer, faster and easier to use. We believe the time has come to take the next step and move cryptocurrencies from exchanges and wallets into everyday shopping use. Eligma will include its own transaction gateway that will enable the use of cryptocurrencies even in stores that don’t accept them yet.  ⦁ An impressive advisory board  Eligma boasts a renowned advisory board and we are very happy that so many influential people see how big of a project it can become. People like Charlie Shrem, Andy Baynes, Hermann Eul, Jure Leskovec and many others are here to help us in the long term, giving us a vast array of knowledge that will help us on our path.  ⦁ The ELI is a true utility token  Our tokens are not here just so we can distribute them during our crowdsale and then forget about them. They will have genuine usefulness on the platform as the foundation of our loyalty program that will enable users to earn ELI tokens in one store on the platform and spend them in any other partnered store. They will also be able to use them for advanced platform features, such as product hunts, second-hand listings, escrow fees, decentralized item sales on the blockchain, advertising and purchasing selected exclusive items.  ⦁ We have locked the ETH exchange rate at 800 USD  As stated above, we do not only believe in cryptocurrencies, but are doing our best to bring them into the mainstream. To do so, we want to build a large community that will start using Eligma, cryptocurrencies and ELI tokens as soon as possible. As an incentive to do this and to ensure that early investors are not worse off because they bought their ETH early, we have locked its exchange rate at 800 USD, which is well over its current market value.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: There are certain features on the platform that will with utilization of blockchain technology enable transparent and unalterable data:   Traceability: Any product, purchased through the Eligma platform or manually added to the user`s Product inventory, will receive a Digital Item Profile (DIP), that will be stored in a sidechain. A product with DIP will be traceable from the moment it was purchased to the present day. Events like change of ownership and warranty details will be trackable through publicly accessible sidechain. Unalterable transactions and records - On sidechain, DIPs will be stored as Smart Contracts (transactions), that will form a transparent ledger of blocks, inherently resistant to modification of the data. Sidechain block's hashes will be stored on Ethereum Network and thus enable everyone to check that blocks remained unchanged since the moment of creation. Cryptocurrency - utilizing our services with Ethereum ERC-20 compliant ELI utility token we created a portable and tradeable digital token, exchangeable between users. Smart Contracts - to support decentralized second market deals between users, we will assist in the process of formation of Smart Contracts, that will contain vital information about the subject of exchange. Usability - other web and decentralized applications will be able to use sidechain data either to analyze data or track certain patterns. .

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi Hakamura, what you wrote is far from true and hereby we will explain why. Following problems were identified and will be addressed by Eligma:  Online product research and shopping are time consuming: People spend a lot of time researching online to find the product and the deal that suits their needs, but even the most persistent ones cannot check all the online store offers. Users are never certain, whether they found the best possible deal. User privacy issues: Users disclose personal data with every store, where they want to place an order. Their every move on the store’s website is also being monitored. This means that stores are collecting extensive behavioural data about each user and can connect that data directly to the person. Registration with every online store is required: Users have to separately register with each online store they want to shop in. Due to this inconvenience, they can be discouraged from placing an order in a new online store. Keeping track of different accounts can be a hassle and therefore consumers are returning only to stores, where they are already registered. Keeping track of household belongings: Users do not have an overview of what they own and how much their belongings are worth. Every household has many products that still have value, but are never used and people forget about even having them. Creating second-hand listings for faster sale conversions: When trying to sell used items, users are having problems setting the appropriate price and selecting a second-hand market with the highest probability of finding potential buyers. Usually they list products on some of those markets and forget about the listing, as it rarely converts into a successful sale. Payments with cryptocurrencies are not possible: With growing wealth held in cryptocurrencies, the demand for conducting payments in those currencies is growing. Very few online stores stepped into this direction, even though all the indicators are showing that in the future cryptocurrencies are going to become mainstream. Vast number of individual loyalty programs: Big retailers have introduced loyalty programs a long time ago, but those programs are not connected. This means that in order for users to really benefit from a program, they have to keep track of every one of them, which is next to impossible. Incomplete or inaccurate product descriptions: Most online stores provide their own descriptions. The quality of those descriptions varies from store to store and it is very hard for users to know which one of them is relevant. In most cases, when users are searching for products with a higher price, they have to first visit the manufacturer’s website to find the description they can trust. Lack of a personalized approach: Despite the adoption of new technologies, most online stores are still not embracing the personalized shopping experience approach. In many cases, online stores are displaying inappropriate products to the wrong customers and it is up to the users to browse the store and find the product that best suits their needs.  As it is understood for more complex projects, Eligma is a modular platform and features will be added in accordance with the roadmap at latest. Our first solution, which is a cryptocurrency payment gateway called Elipay is already being tested in BTC City (one of the biggest shopping and entertainment areas in Europe) and will be launched very soon and made availabile to its users. Have you seen this posts: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/jo%C5%BEe-mermal-eligmas-cofounder-makes-the-first-elipay-transaction-in-an-offline-store-eae6c3a728df DJ Umek, one of the biggest international stars of the electronic scene, also became one of the first Elipay users! We joined him for his first crypto purchase at the Tomas sport2 Sneakers store in BTC City.  All of the features are already being developed and we will regularly inform the community about our process. For example on the following link you can find an intro for discovery pillar: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligmas-minimum-viable-product-demonstration-8611b45dd999. Discovery pillar will be launched in Slovenia already in this year where we will optimise Eligma for our intended market entry strategy that starts already next year.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: What Eligma and CTXC have in common is only that both are incorporating AI but the purpose of platforms is completely different and the products cannot be compared. For example, AI will be used in many parts of Eligma product, such as to improve discovery results, compare blueprints and product specifications to be able to suggest alternative options, to suggest the value of items owned and included in user’s inventory, the best time to sell it, etc...  You can read more about the AI in the interview with our lead machine learning engineer Bostjan Mrak: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/our-lead-machine-learning-engineer-reveals-how-eligma-will-think-a5206da31a4b  We are currently in the middle of our crowdsale and we will keep community updated on the exchanges where ELI token will be listed. So far we can tell you that we are already in conversations with several exchanges in order to be listed as soon as possible after the crowdsale ends, but the details will be disclosed when the deals are finished and signed.

Author: geoneojapan
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: History was made yesterday in BTC City, one of the largest shopping and entertainment complexes in Europe that is becoming a cradle of innovation. Its president and Eligma’s cofounder Jože Mermal paid for a two-hour spa package with Bitcoins, marking the first payment using the Elipay cryptocurrency gateway.  We caught up with Jože after the big event for a short chat.  What persuaded you to not only join the project, but also invest in it?  The BTC company and myself have always been open to ground-breaking and innovative ideas that simplify and upgrade existing systems and frameworks and society-friendly concepts. With this vision we also managed to establish BTC CITY, the biggest business, shopping, recreational, cultural and innovative centre in SE Europe, which hosts more than 21 million visitors every year. That’s why I believe in Eligma and support it. It is a project that will enable simplified and modern online shopping for people in Slovenia and all over the world. This is how the BTC company will do its part in creating and developing new shopping process trends and provide its visitors with a modern online and shopping experience.  Why do BTC City and its retailers find it important to implement new technologies, especially blockchain technologies?  BTC CITY has always been an environment, whose main goal was the well-being of its visitors, buyers and business partners. Our habits are changing, and every segment of our everyday lives is becoming simpler. The main building blocks of what I mentioned are technologies that we are gradually implementing into our lives and which we have mostly accepted and cannot picture our lives without them. The BTC company has always embraced changing environments, habits and trends as we want to offer our visitors and business partners a modern and advanced surrounding where they will feel good and happily create and develop their business goals. Among a number of other functionalities, blockchain technology enables transparency and traceability, which are the two key building blocks of every system in the private or public sphere. That is what we want to offer all of our visitors and business partners.   Elipay is Eligma’s cryptocurrency transaction gateway. What will it bring to the BTC City? What advantages do you see in cryptocurrencies and what do you personally think about them?  BTC is a free-thinking company that is creating an open, modern and innovative ecosystem. We want to give our visitors and business partners options and opportunities. That includes different methods of paying for services and products. People must have the freedom to decide how they want to shop and pay. We have transited from cash management to card and online payments. Currency exchange has become quick and easy, so I believe it’s time to embrace the future and not hide from it. Cryptocurrencies are already here, so we want to enable all BTC CITY visitors to pay however they want. With the Elipay transaction system we will give them exactly that free will and an open society.  Eligma will perform its initial tests in BTC City. Why are BTC City and its Living Lab so suitable for this purpose?  The BTC CITY Living lab (testing environment) is an ecosystem within the BTC CITY Ljubljana. As a city within Ljubljana, the capital city of Slovenia, it’s unique in a spatial and business sense. Therefore, testing different technologies and prototypes is something that is natural to us, as it allows us to give our visitors access to the latest technologies (Eligma, Nedo, Smart parking, BTC Autonomous vehicle Living Lab, SmartCity, etc.). At the same time visitors provide us with very important information and real feedback and insights that tell us whether that solution, technology or prototype is the correct one for our and / or the international market.  How do you picture e-commerce in 5 years?  People create trends and technologies that help us raise the quality of our lives according to our needs. That’s why I believe it’s extremely important to listen to people’s wishes, needs and changing shopping and processing habits, strive to optimize them and create a people-friendly environment. We can already see the arrival of a hybrid shopping and trading concept that will greatly simplify our shopping practices. Buyers will enjoy a safe, quick and simplified shopping experience that will represent a permanent connection of the physical and digital worlds. ELIGMA is representing a large part of e-commerce and online shopping future. It will change and simplify online shopping with its advanced technological solutions and functionalities and by doing so create new trends, guidelines and online shopping habits. The BTC company will always do its best to implement new technologies that will enable a modern and friendly shopping environment.

Author: kajaaja
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Wise deicision!    By listening to our community and taking its voice into account, we have made an important decision. We will burn all ELI tokens that will not be sold in our crowdsale.  What is token burning  This simply means that whatever number of ELI tokens that will not be sold in our crowdsale will be destroyed forever. If we combine that with the fact that there will be no more ELI token generation events in the future, it means that the token supply will remain fixed. It will also prevent Eligma to hold a large percentage of ELI tokens and have a too large of a share in the ELI token economy.  The Eligma crowdsale  We were considering this option for a while and the feedback we received from our community only confirmed our reasoning that this is the correct way to move forward. You can still participate in our token crowdsale until 8th May, for which we have also locked the ETH exchange rate at 800 $.

Author: geoneojapan
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: For all!   Nice FAQ    1. When does the public crowdsale start and end?  Our public crowdsale starts 17 April 2018 at 11:00 UTC and ends 8 May 2018 at 11:00 UTC (or until all tokens are sold out).  2. Am I too late to pass the KYC process for the public crowdsale?  No, the KYC process will be open until our public crowdsale is finished.  3. How do I register for the public crowdsale?  Visit https://kyc.eligma.io/kyc-individuals to complete the KYC process and whitelist your address.  4. If I already passed the KYC process for any of the presale phases, do I have to pass it again for the public crowdsale phase?  No, you only need to pass the KYC process once for all phases. The only exception is if you want ELI tokens sent to a different wallet address. In that case you need to repeat the KYC process with a new email and a new wallet address with which you will participate.  5. How many ELI tokens will be available during the public crowdsale?  During the public crowdsale there will be 84 million ELI tokens plus all the unsold tokens from the previous phases available.  6. What are the minimum and maximum contribution?  Minimum possible contribution: 0.1 ETH.  Maximum possible contribution: Our public crowdsale will be carried out in two steps. For the first three hours, we will set a low maximum contribution of 10 ETH to assure that as many of our supporters as possible will be able to obtain at least a small number of tokens with the highest bonus of 8 % (please see all the available bonuses below). If a contributor sends an ETH contribution in one or more transactions that exceeds the maximum set amount, the exceeding amount in ETH, reduced by a transaction fee (gas), will be returned to his wallet. After the first three hours, we will remove the maximum contribution limit until the end of our public crowdsale.  7. Are there any bonuses in the public crowdsale?  Yes, they are broken down like this:  1. 8 % of additional tokens for the first 20 million ELI tokens,  2. 6 % of additional tokens for the second 20 million ELI tokens,  3. 4 % of additional tokens for the third 20 million ELI tokens,  4. 2 % of additional tokens for the fourth 20 million ELI tokens.  5. 0 % for the remaining number of tokens.  8. Can I participate with any other cryptocurrency or only with ETH?  ELI is offered only in exchange for ETH contributions.  9. Which wallets can be used to participate in the public crowdsale?  Please do not use online exchange wallets to send ETH, as you might not be able to receive ELI tokens to those addresses and your tokens will be lost. ELI is an ETH based ERC-20 standard token and participants must use compatible private ETH wallets, such as myetherwallet (MEW). If you are interested in using any other wallets, please check directly with that wallet provider to prevent any potential issues.  10. Can I use the same individualized wallet address to deposit ETH for the public crowdsale as I used for presale?  No. We will use a public ETH address for the public crowdsale phase. We will send this address to everyone who completed our KYC process already. Every potential supporter that completes a new KYC process will also receive an e-mail with the public ETH address for contributions.  11. How many tokens will I get if I invest 1 ETH?  We have locked the ETH exchange rate at 800 $ on April 10th, therefore you will receive:  1 ETH * 800 $ = 800 $  Price of 1 ELI token is 0.1 USD  800 $ / 0.1 USD= 8,000 ELI tokens  8,000 ELI + 8 % public crowdsale bonus for the first 20 million ELI tokens = 8,000 ELI + (8,000 * 0.08) ELI = 8,640 ELI tokens  8,000 ELI + 6 % public crowdsale bonus for the second 20 million ELI tokens = 8,000 ELI + (8,000 * 0.06) ELI = 8,480 ELI tokens  8,000 ELI + 4 % public crowdsale bonus for the third 20 million ELI tokens = 8,000 ELI + (8,000 * 0.04) ELI = 8,320 ELI tokens  8,000 ELI + 2 % public crowdsale bonus for the fourth 20 million ELI tokens = 8,000 ELI + (8,000 * 0.02) ELI = 8,160 ELI tokens  8,000 ELI + 0 % public crowdsale bonus for the rest of ELI tokens = 8,000 ELI tokens  12. When will I be able to transfer tokens after the public crowdsale ends?  When we receive your ETH contribution, you will immediately get your ELI tokens. They will be locked for the remainder of the public crowdsale and a short confirmation period, in which we will check if the token distribution in all phases executed correctly. After successful validation of the process, all tokens will be unlocked and become transferable.  13. How much was raised in the presale phases?  We raised 14,550 ETH in both presale phases.

For example on the following link you can find an intro for discovery pillar: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligmas-minimum-viable-product-demonstration-8611b45dd999. Author: xiao2017
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Good explain   ELIGMA EXPLAINED  The concept of Eligma was born as a response to several key trends and problems identified in traditional retail as well as online shopping, where the use of the latter has exploded in the recent decade. The goal of our project is to offer a set of previously impossible or unanticipated solutions to discover, purchase, track and resell items. This is now viable thanks to the development of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. Three main pillars, discovery, inventory and loyalty, will enable Eligma to become an AI-driven and blockchain-based platform that acts as a personal commerce agent.

Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Respect for that move!     Why we decided to lock the Ethereum exchange rate at 800 $ First of all, I would like to extend my sincere thanks for all your contributions in our presale and trust in the Eligma project. You are a great community!  As we announced yesterday, we will lock the Ethereum exchange rate at 800 $ before our token distribution on April 17th for private presale, public presale and public crowdsale phases. I wanted to share my thoughts on why we are doing this with the whole community.   As you all know, the whole crypto market has been very volatile in the last few months, e.g. Ethereum exchange rate has fallen from 850 $ in the beginning of March to as low as 365 $, which was the exchange rate on April 1st.  What would that mean for our contributors?  It would put our earliest contributors, our most loyal followers, at a disadvantage. Let’s assume they bought 1 Ethereum to contribute on March 4th, about two weeks before the start of our public presale. They paid approximately 850 $ for 1 Ethereum, which they contributed in our presale. For that amount they would receive 8,500 ELI tokens (our exchange rate is 1 ELI = 0,1 $). However, since we will be locking the ETH/USD exchange rate on April 17th, there is a very good chance they would receive a much lower number of ELI tokens. If we take today’s exchange rate of approximately 415 USD into account, those same contributors would only receive 4,150 ELI tokens.  How did we come to our conclusion?  This presented us with a dilemma, which in the end proved easy to resolve. While we could have simply blamed the market and say that we cannot do anything about it, that just didn’t feel right. We all felt it would be disrespectful to the people who believe in us the most and contributed early. By locking a higher ETH exchange rate, we created the same playing field for everyone and ensured that bonuses for early contributors do not get lost in the current lower exchange rate.  The second reason that helped us with our decision was our strong belief in the crypto world and blockchain technologies, so we gladly took a large part of the risk upon ourselves. By making this step, we wanted to prove that we are here for the long term and that our vision and roadmap are clear and solid. We are hoping that all of you feel the same and decide to keep our tokens for using them on our platform when it goes live.  I would like to take this opportunity to invite everyone to participate in our crowdsale, which starts April 17th, and join the future of commerce.

Author: kvanier
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Our CEO, Dejan Roljic, explains why we have locked the Ethereum exchange rate at 800 $: “We wanted to give our early contributors a fair deal and show how confident we are in cryptocurrencies, blockchain technologies and the long-term outlook of the project.”  https://medium.com/eligma-blog/why-we-decided-to-lock-the-ethereum-exchange-rate-at-800-7e89894605f6

Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: MARKET  The possibility to shop at any time and the ability to compare prices and find better deals are the main reasons consumers rather shop online than in physical stores (KPMG, 2017). Research shows that the online shopping market is growing yearly (in 2016, retail e-commerce sales worldwide amounted to 1.86 trillion U.S. dollars and e-retail revenues are projected to grow to 4.48 trillion U.S. dollars in 2021 (Statista, 2017)) and that people are already losing a lot of time searching for the right product. The offer is vast and the online shopping ecosystem is very dispersed. The second-hand online market is blooming and will probably grow even faster if certain seller and buyer security measures are implemented.   Market is big guys!   Eligma worldwide adoption will be done

Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Girls and boys look at these happy leet people from Eligma!   The Eligma team video We have been very busy working on the smart commerce platform Eligma that will save you time while shopping, make it possible for you to track and resell what you have and enable you take part in a single loyalty program for all participating stores. Last week though, we had the opportunity to do one of the more fun things in a crowdsale process — shooting a team video.  Although none of us are movie stars (yet!), we all enjoyed taking turns in front of the camera with different levels of success. All three of our co-founders joined us and some of our advisors chipped in as well. After a day of hustle and bustle in an office filled with filming equipment most of us felt more tired than working on the product we feel so passionate about, so I don’t think we will be losing team members to Hollywood anytime soon.  We hope you have at least as much fun watching the video as we had making it!   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjthTMzDmz8

Author: diomiobadass
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: THE ELIGMA PLATFORM  The core of the Eligma platform is an AI-driven module that will help users discover best deals for desired products in any online store based on their preferences. It uses several sources of user data to achieve the optimum results. Eligma also connects the offline and online worlds to upgrade the shopping experience and ensure that each user really finds the best deal. Eligma will also introduce a unified shopping account, meaning that a single shopping cart and checkout process will suffice to complete purchases in multiple online stores at once, whereas the platform`s cryptocurrency payment gateway will enable users to pay with cryptocurrencies even if the online stores don’t support them yet.  with that idea  worldwide adoption is guaranteed!

Author: WhenMCLAREN
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: ELIPAAAAAY on Cointelegraph:  A start-up which aims to make Blockchain technology and cryptocurrency payments an everyday feature of mainstream shopping has announced that “one of the most renowned representatives of the crypto community” is joining its advisory board.  Eligma is developing an e-commerce platform enabling consumers to shop on multiple websites through a unified account, along with an artificial intelligence (AI) system which uses the data this generates to offer personalized recommendations on new products and deals. An inventory is going to allow users to keep track of their purchases and discover the best (and most profitable) time to sell unwanted items on second-hand websites. Meanwhile, customers in brick-and-mortar stores will be able to buy items using cryptocurrency through a system called EliPay.

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: That is fabolous idea and i think Eligma team will realize it!   Buying the right product with artificial intelligence I am just about to start the washing machine to wash my son’s soccer practice dirty clothes. When I press start, nothing happens. The machine died on me. This time I am calm as I know exactly what to do. No need for browsing through a bunch of online stores, comparing products, reading reviews and searching for better deals.  I pick up my phone, visit Eligma’s website and log into my account. I enter “washing machine” in the search field and press the “Discover” button. Eligma’s AI starts browsing through its huge database of products and online stores and displays the most suitable offers. A carefully designed chatbot helps me narrow down the search results and only shows offers that can be delivered to my home. I complete my order without being redirected to any other online store. I can also pay with cryptocurrencies even if the store where I bought the product doesn’t accept them yet.  If I want to save some more money and can put up with dirty soccer clothes for a little bit longer, I can also select the product hunt option. With it, Eligma tracks prices for the selected time period and tells me when the price of the washing machine drops to an amount I am willing to pay.

Author: hrbt
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Selling and buying used items Immediately after I make a purchase on Eligma, the product data and purchase information are safely stored in my private inventory. Eligma’s price predictor tells me how much the product is worth and how that value will change in the future, so I know exactly when to sell it if I want.  Remember the TV I bought 2 years ago? Eligma suggests that I should sell it now. I choose the “Sell” option in the inventory, select desired second-hand stores from the list and hit the “Confirm” button.  Soon, a potential customer finds my TV and wants to purchase it, but he has bad experience with second-hand purchases. He wants to make sure that I am going to send the item and that it is in the condition stated. For this reason, Eligma provides secure and unchangeable product data in the inventory by using blockchain and smart contracts. We agree to use Eligma as an intermediary that holds the buyer’s money until he receives the product and confirms everything is OK. Only then will I receive his payment!    No more coupons There is something else I won’t be needing in 2 years’ time: all those loyalty cards and points I cannot keep track of and can only be used at the store where I received them.  Meet the ELI token, a universal loyalty token. It is a crypto token that Eligma will use for its unified loyalty program. When I purchased my washing machine for 800$, the seller gave me a 50$ worth of ELI tokens as a cashback. They were automatically sent to my wallet in my Eligma account without me having to claim them in any way.  Tomorrow, I am going fishing and I need a new rod and spinning reel set. I found the perfect one on Eligma and it costs 140$. When paying, I select to redeem the ELI tokens from my wallet and save 50$ on my purchase even though I have not visited that fishing store before.   Good stuff!

Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We’re excited to announce that on April 8th at 7 pm CEST (UTC+2), Eligma’s Founder and CEO, Dejan Roljič, will be doing a YouTube AMA.  Dejan Roljič will be answering the questions from the Eligma Telegram Community and other social media channels. This is your chance to get the scoop on anything and everything Eligma-related directly from the source. Also that’s an opportunity to prepare yourself for the upcoming crowdsale and learn about an exciting project in the blockchain space!  We will answer as many questions as possible during the session. To submit a question on Telegram, just use the hashtag #AMA (for example: #AMA Why should I buy Eligma’s tokens?), or reach out to us on Twitter, Bitcointalk, Reddit, or any of our social media channels.  All the questions have to be sent by April 7th, 23:59 CEST (UTC+2). Author: masstahcoiner
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma MVP  good reading!    At Eligma, we are working full steam to develop our platform and we are happy to announce that our AI-driven category predictor has reached its alpha stage. It is a module that classifies entered search queries into product categories. We put Eligma through a machine learning process to be able to recognize categories for products users are searching for. This will enable it to predict detailed product features users are looking for even if they enter very basic specifications. Eligma will “remember” those searches and use that knowledge for even better and more personalized searches in the future!  Because the database we are using at the moment consists mostly from consumer electronics, we conducted a few searches for those kinds of products with very good results already.  You can check out our video below or take a look at the training model source code on our GitHub and let us know if you have any questions or comments.  https://medium.com/eligma-blog/eligmas-minimum-viable-product-demonstration-8611b45dd999

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi abanansah, it is nice that you like our project. You presented a short sum up of our Inventory pillar, but we shall not forget that there are also Discovery and Loyalty pillar of Eligma that aims to holistically address recognized issues. Here is slightly more detailed explaination of Inventory pillar:  Eligma will create a blockchain-tracked Digital Item Profile (DIP) for every item purchased through the platform, where users can store several records, including Proofs of Purchase. Every DIP will be automatically written into the user’s inventory. In order for the user to have an overview of all the items in his household, he will also be able to manually add elsewhere purchased items.  Within the inventory, users will be able to see the AI-predicted current and future item value. Eligma’s household trading agent will notify users when the best time to sell the product is. It will automatically generate and publish listings on selected second-hand online stores with a single click. If a user chooses to replace that product, Eligma will even propose a suitable replacement.  To make C2C transactions safer for the user, Eligma will offer two solutions to both trading parties. With its Escrow service, Eligma will act as a trusted intermediary and ensure fairness of contractual terms. The second option is a completely decentralized sale on the blockchain, where both parties will make a deposit into a smart contract as a guarantee. These deposits and the buyer’s payment will remain locked until the contract terms are fulfilled.  https://www.eligma.io/forum/inventory.png

Author: aarondes
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We are launching test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) in the beginning of April. Many big stores are already with us and much more will join very soon.  The MVP is projected for August this year, with the first version of the Eligma platform developed by the end of the year and later expanded to other markets in accordance with the roadmap above.  To demonstrate that Eligma is here to stay, we are proud to announce EliPay. Most of the stores we will be working with are currently operating strictly as brick-and-mortar entitites which gives us the opportunity to combine the online and offline worlds of commerce. EliPay’s primary purpose will be to enable visitors of BTC City to use cryptocurrencies in al the center’s stores. We are hoping EliPay will bring cryptocurrency to the mainstream; all retailers will receive our cryptocurrency transaction systems and consumers will be able to use a mobile app. The iOS version will be released first, and the Android version will follow in the next few months.  For quick understanding you can also find two videos on our webpage: https://www.eligma.io

Author: kvanier
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We are launching test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) in beginning of April. MVP is projected for August this year, with the first version of the Eligma platform developed by the end of the year and later expanded to other markets in accordance with roadmap you can find in our whitepaper on pages 49-51: https://goo.gl/aqhn8m.  Simultaneously different features and modules presented will be added. Currently we are developing the data gathering services (scrappers, API connections,...) as well as machine learning algorithm for product matching and categorization. We also already have the database architecture setup. Our ultimate goal is that eventually all stores within BTC City would support Elipay. We are just about to start our testing phase and then add additional stores.  To demonstrate that Eligma is here to stay, we are proud to announce EliPay. Most of the stores we will be working with are currently operating strictly as brick-and-mortar entitites which gives us the opportunity to combine the online and offline worlds of commerce. EliPay’s primary purpose will be to enable visitors of BTC City to use cryptocurrencies in al the center’s stores. We are hoping EliPay will bring cryptocurrency to the mainstream; all retailers will receive our cryptocurrency transaction systems and consumers will be able to use a mobile app. The iOS version will be released first, and the Android version will follow in the next few months.  Consumers will need to download and install the EliPay app, register with the service, and deposit cryptocurrencies in their mobile wallets on the app. At first, BTC and Bitcoin Cash will be supported, and more cryptocurrencies will be supported in the future.  Retailers will have two options: either keep the funds in cryptocurrency, or take advantage of EliPay’s exchange feature, which will contact via API, exchange the funds into fiat, and transfer the appropriate sum into the retailer’s account.  Most funds will be kept in cold storage at a secure location, so even in the unfortunate event that the Eligma platform is compromised, all the funds will be kept safe. You can read more about our MVP's test release in BTC City here, scheduled for April 2018: https://medium.com/eligma-blog/bitcoin-city-4c3e302f5821

Author: cryptoworld2017
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Very impressive interview with Eligma CEO  Tell us a little about your personal motivations with the project. What keeps your team driven?  Belief in the idea. If your whole team feels passionate about the project, no work and effort are too hard.   What was your thought process while assembling your advisory board?   We recognized how complex of a project Eligma is from the start. We wanted to involve people that would cover every aspect of the project (AI, blockchain, finance, etc.). Most of all, we wanted advisors that were not just faces in our whitepaper, but people that genuinely believe in the project and are willing to help make it a reality.  Tell us a little about your team’s culture. What are some key characteristics define your team?  In a way, you answered the question already. They have to be a team, not just a group of individuals. If they don’t get along, everything falls apart. They have to trust in the project and be willing to put in the hard work required.  What about the current online shopping system is broken? Why is decentralisation a good approach to solve this?  The biggest problems are the abundance of choices, unsafe transactions on second-hand markets and fragmented loyalty programs. Decentralization is not a solution for everything but is perfect for improving the security of used goods sales. With smart contracts acting as trustless agents, buyers and sellers can be sure that they are getting the deal they agreed to.   Tell us about the AI component about Eligma? What goes into building a decentralised AI app?  Our AI enables us to implement a few important features – a discovery that will enable users to quickly find the best offer according to their demands, a chatbot which will help refine user searches and the option of tracking the value of household items. In the last case, our AI will also suggest when the best time to sell them is. Let me point out that our AI is not decentralized as that would not make any sense in our case.  What were your biggest product challenges you faced so far?  Acquiring enough data … in order for our AI to function as well as we envision it, we need a huge amount of data. We are confident however that we will be able to collect enough to give our users a not-before-seen shopping experience.   How does EliPay, your offline offering, fit into your overall vision, given your online first approach?  Eligma is being developed as a comprehensive solution, meaning we are not focusing only on online stores. We intend to bring the online and offline worlds of commerce together on one platform. If you think about in this way, EliPay becomes the perfect example of how Eligma will work, bringing cryptocurrencies into the mainstream.  How did your partnership with BTC city come about? What advantages does this give you?  We have worked with BTC City before when I was still the CEO of ABC Accelerator. They have recognised the advantages of start-ups and new technologies very early and developed their city as a polygon for new ideas, companies and technologies, especially blockchain and cryptocurrencies recently. Being able to test Eligma in BTC City is a huge advantage, as it represents a small piece of world commerce with its different business units, online and offline. We will be able to test Eligma on a smaller scale, gather enough data and make corrections where needed for our expansion to the UK and beyond.    Your roadmap looks pretty aggressive. How will you go about executing it?  We are aware how complex of an undertaking Eligma is. We also know how fast the crypto world is moving. We considered both aspects when creating the roadmap. It is designed in such a way that we will achieve milestones as quickly as possible, but with enough time that they function as well as we believe they can. We will ensure that it comes to fruition with two simple words – hard work!  What are your opinions about the current state of the crypto industry?  At Eligma, we are all firm crypto and blockchain believers. A lot has happened in the last year or two. I think the industry is now in the phase of sorting itself out. What technologies are here to stay and what projects are well thought out and backed? These questions will get answered in the next few months and the path forward will be clear.  What do you think about ICOs as a fundraising instrument? Do you think they’re here to stay?  Yes, they are here to stay, but in different forms than we now know them. With the EU and the US preparing stricter regulations, companies that want to do crowd sales will have to adapt. We already planned our crowdsale with strict measures regarding the KYC process and data privacy in mind and crowd sales in the future will have to do the same.  What is your advice to anyone thinking of conducting an ICO today?  Do your research and don’t take it lightly. A crowdsale is by no means a sure thing. You have to have a great idea, a passionate team and enough people to back you. When you hit a rough patch, and that will happen, you have to persevere and remember what you are trying to accomplish. You have to go all in or you won’t succeed.

Author: hrbtzor
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: The core of the Eligma platform is an AI-driven module that will help users discover best deals for desired products in any online store based on their preferences. It uses several sources of user data to achieve the optimum results. Eligma also connects the offline and online worlds to upgrade the shopping experience and ensure that each user really finds the best deal. Eligma will also introduce a unified shopping account, meaning that a single shopping cart and checkout process will suffice to complete purchases in multiple online stores at once, whereas the platform`s cryptocurrency payment gateway will enable users to pay with cryptocurrencies even if the online stores don’t support them yet.   AI will take place with Eligma   it will be the most soficticated system

Author: geoneojapan
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hacked is leet magazine!  Eligma is HOT  https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-eligma/   Growth Potential Eligma deploys AI and neural network based layer on top of e-commerce platforms, which gives it a distinct advantage over existing price discovery platforms. E-commerce is one of the fastest growing industries globally. Eligma solves some of the major issues that users face in the industry. Even if Eligma can capture a small section of the global e-commerce industry, it will be considered extremely successful. Enigma’s platform will have millions of listed products, collated from thousands of e-commerce websites all accessible via a unified account and loyalty program. This concept will be very appealing to the end users. A strong team and quality advisors support the project. Eligma has also partnered with multiple organizations, primarily in the Slovenian region where the first phase of the implementation will be done.

Author: almuntaqim
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hello, I would like to provide you with quality translations and proofreading in any combination of the following languages:  English, Arabic, Spanish, Portuguese, Romanian.  I am native/fluent in Romanian, English, and Arabic.  I am fluent/proficient in Portuguese and Spanish.  I have been working as a professional translator for more than 5 years. I was an interpreter for USAID, ICMPD, IOM and other international organizations with English/Arabic/Romanian. For the better part of the last two years, I have also worked as a business developer and analyst, so I am very accustomed to ICO/blockchain/business/BTC specific vocabulary. I also have a Ph.D. in linguistics (dialectology) and am well versed in NLP and computational linguistics as well.  Trust me, I know you may have heard this before, but I am an actual polyglot, with the highest degree of specialization in linguistics so I know what I'm talking about here.     PORTFOLIO Romanian Ministry of Justice, Bucharest (Romania) International Organization for Migration United States Agency for International Development (USAID), Washington (United States) International Centre for Migration Policy Development (ICMPD), Vienna (Austria) The University of Bucharest, Bucharest (Romania) Various private companies ADO SAH ROM (NGO)  I can send you my resume if you contact me via PM and I will reply to you as soon as possible, Thank you kindly, Gabriel

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Eligma - Revolutionary Approach to Online Shopping Using AI and Blockchain  The online shopping and second-hand markets are one of the most rapidly growing industries in the world and reached 2.3 trillion U.S. dollars in sales last year. However, with more and more stores emerging, users often find it difficult to track all their credentials and loyalty programs.  Now, a new AI-driven and blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform – Eligma – aims to change the way people discover, purchase, track and resell items online. It is a first of its kind platform that is developed as a unified solution that will not compete with online stores but work in synergy with them.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/revolutionary-approach-to-online-shopping/

Body: "The KYC procedure is a mandatory procedure in the financial sector and is becoming a common standard for cryptocurrency exchanges as well as token crowdsales. Despite all the positive change that cryptocurrencies introduced in the past years, there is no doubt that they have been used for money laundering purposes[1]. Nevertheless, there are many heated discussions on online channels and forums[2], as well as many differing expert opinions about the (un)necessity and (il)legitimacy of KYC procedures."  Click the link below to read our latest post on the significance of KYC procedures to get a full breakdown:  https://medium.com/eligma-blog/the-significance-of-the-kyc-procedure-4d07490bb155

Author: davrog
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hey guys!  I've done analysis for Eligma, an AI-DRIVEN AND BLOCKCHAIN-BASED COGNITIVE COMMERCE PLATFORM Real-world use case with prototype!  Short summary Eligma will be an AI-driven and blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform that will change the way people discover, purchase, track and resell items online. Its unique features will offer users a “one-place”, from where they can shop in all the online stores anywhere in the world, check the value of items in their household and learn the best time to sell them. Eligma will offer users a completely decentralized universal loyalty program and help transform every household into a business. EVERY HOUSEHOLD IS A BUSINESS  Team leaders Founder manages BTC City—a 400,000 m2 area in Slovenia with more than 3,000 companies, 450 stores, 70 bars, restaurants and over 20 million yearly visitors. It is one of the largest shopping areas in Europe. They will test platform here!  Co-founder owns ABC accelerator which was named the best start-up accelerator in Central Europe with new offices popping-up in Silicon Valley, Germany, Slovenia, Ukraine.  Team Strong team with good working experience, 2 all stars.  Advisers All star advisors (worked for Google, Apple, eBay, Celtra)  Prototype Web wallet and testing of online platform run in BTC City accepting BTC and BCH from March until April.  Token metrics Token Public pre-Sale Start Date: Mar 20th End Date: Apr 10th Token Ticker: $ELI Max Supply: 500,000,000 Price per $ELI: .1 USD Minimum Contribution: 0.1 ETH Ian Balina spreadsheet score: 87.72% (used a copy of Balina's spreadsheets)  Hardcap: ~$24M USD Invest With: ETH  - 8 % for the first 20 mio. ELI tokens, - 6 % for the second 20 mio. ELI tokens  I am still not sold because of the long roadmap. For basic functionality we will need to wait for a year. Am I reading whitepaper right?  What are your thoughts? I would love to hear comments on the analysis.

Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: We are launching test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) in beginning of April. MVP is projected for August this year, with the first version of the Eligma platform developed by the end of the year and later expanded to other markets in accordance with roadmap you can find in our whitepaper on pages 48-51: https://www.eligma.io/pdf/eligma-white-paper_v1.3.pdf. Simultaneously different features and modules presented will be added. Currently we are developing the data gathering services (scrappers, API connections,...) as well as machine learning algorithm for product matching and categorization. We also already have the database architecture setup.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi Bulllbas,  while we are striving that some of the features will be decentralised (i.e. DIP stored on blockchain, decentralised item sale, loyalty program ...), our intentions are not to establish completely decentralised product. In this case we would need to cope with high transaction costs on Ethereum Network that would occur in completely decentralised system.  Any product, purchased through the Eligma platform or manually added to the user`s Product inventory, will receive a Digital Item Profile (DIP), that will be stored in a sidechain and its block's hashes to Ethereum Network. DIPs include several information (including owners ID) that will be encrypted and not accessible until the user decides so. As an additional security feature for both the seller and a buyer, Eligma will also develop a mechanism to execute a purchase or any trade process in a completely decentralized way using smart contracts on a blockchain. To continue with, Eligma will offer also a completely decentralized universal loyalty program any merhant could join. There will be no need to register with a standalone loyalty program and users will be able to redeem acquire. If you want to dig even further, please take a look at our whitepaper: https://www.eligma.io/pdf/eligma-white-paper_v1.1.pdf

Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Great question ZuLLA141. We are glad to see that you are already thinking about how the ELI tokens will be used, if they can be shared, etc. Well, once Eligma goes live it will enable different features and since we would like to incorporate social comopnent as well, one of our intentions is also the possibility that user can share or transfer their ELIs with others if desired so.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: If we are talking about the participation in our ELI token events (presale and crowdsale), citizens, nationals and any persons residing in United States of America (including all territories) as well as in Canada, China, Singapore and South Korea cannot participate.  But regarding the question asked for social network, we will launch the platform in Slovenia and are planning to expand it first to UK and than furter to other regions, also outside Europe until present worldwide. Through communication channels and social media interections we will enable everybody to be engaged since the beginning, while users will be able to use the platform in accordance with our geogprahical expansion.

Body: Hi BoBeRcENkO,  Eligma is backed by six relevant partners (BTC City, ABC Accelerator, Viberate, Netis, Spartan Solutions and Icecat) that all bring their know-how to the process of making Eligma a world-class undertaking.  As seen from our whitepaper we are launching test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) that connects more than 450 stores. We already signed several letters of intent with additional online stores but this information is still confidential and will be revealed in the future. Important meetings were held also with the biggest players in the industry which information you might find on our social media channels.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi,  for all the details regarding our roadmap please reffer to pages 48 - 51 in our whitepaper (https://www.eligma.io/pdf/eligma-white-paper_v1.1.pdf).  I can tell you that we are already developing our first modules and will be launching test phase of developed POS payment system, together with mobile wallet app in BTC City (Ljubljana, Slovenia) already next month. As you will see in our whitepaper we are lucky to have the possibility to test the product in Slovenia where we will be able to further modify it before we expand to other markets.  First version of the Eligma platform will be developed by the end of the year, than we plan to expand to UK market and further on until present worldwide, what our ultimate goal is. Eligma is modular platform so we will be adding its modules in accordance with roadmap set in whitepaper.

Author: Greenkarki
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Read through the white paper. Had to be more focused in reading. Uniqe project. Users can minimize their energy spending less time in searching the products they wish to purchase by utilizing artificial intelligence. It advises the users on choosing the products to buy by taking into account item components, quality, price, shipping time and costs as well as other factors.  Wish the project gets succeded. Would like to question here. What type of products you advice on? All types of products? How do you differentiate and screen out the difference between products? Kindly apologise if these questions seem silly.

Author: zigaT
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Thank you Greenkarki for the feedback.  Now to answer your question... In the beginning we will start with so called wish-lists (a list of product usually bought together). We will leverage the machine deep learning on our collected data to present the most precise results possible. We already have working prototype for AI categorization and brand recognition. This prototype is currently in alpha stage. After we have confirmed the correct methodology for product discovery, we will increase the range of products up to the point when we have most of the product categories covered.  For screening out the difference between products we will use different techniques, all depending on the category type. As it is always interesting to go deep into more complex examples, I can tell you that in some cases we will really dissect the products specification up to the point of spare parts the product uses. When we know the spare parts of the product we can compare them and consequentially determine the differences between products.  Hopefully this answers your question.  Thank you for the support, Ziga

Author: Greenkarki
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform

Wish alpha stage passes through successfully. More tech oriented. Need to be more careful in making things come live.  You can and will do it.  Will contribute as much I can to support you Enigma team. Lot more good to come. Cheers Zita.

Author: MitjaELI
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: Hi Bulllbas,  while we are striving that some of the features will be decentralised (i.e. DIP stored on blockchain, decentralised item sale, loyalty program ...), our intentions are not to establish completely decentralised product. In this case we would need to cope with high transaction costs on Ethereum Network that would occur in completely decentralised system.  If you are concerned about how the privacy will be ensured when individual lists all the products he/she owns in its inventory, this is how Eligma will achieve it. Any product, purchased through the Eligma platform or manually added to the user`s Product inventory, will receive a Digital Item Profile (DIP), that will be stored in a sidechain and its block's hashes to Ethereum Network. DIPs include several information (including owners ID) that will be encrypted and not accessible. When user decides to sell the product, only information needed about the product to list the offer will be revealed. As an additional security feature for both the seller and a buyer, Eligma will also develop a mechanism to execute a purchase or any trade process in a completely decentralized way using smart contracts on a blockchain.  To continue with, Eligma will offer also a completely decentralized universal loyalty program any merhant could join. There will be no need to register with a standalone loyalty program and users will be able to redeem acquired ELI tokens with any other loyalty network member.

Author: Eligma
Title: [ANN] [ELI] Eligma | AI-driven & blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform
Body: ELIGMA ICO | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM GROUP | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄  INTRODUCING ELIGMA  AI-driven and blockchain-based cognitive commerce platform  ▄▄    OUR VISION  Eligma will serve as a jack-of-all-trades when it comes to e-business. By connecting blockchain and business, we will create a modular platform for commerce and save time that users spend on searching and purchasing products by utilizing artificial intelligence. It will advise users which products to buy by taking into account item components, quality, price, shipping time and costs as well as other factors. It will enable users to securely and transparently sell their used items on multiple second-hand markets at the most appropriate time through their personal item inventories - Eligma will transform every household into a business. All of this will be possible thanks to the innovative use of existing AI and blockchain technologies.    ▄▄ ELIGMA EXPLAINED  The concept of Eligma was born as a response to several key trends and problems identified in traditional retail as well as online shopping, where the use of the latter has exploded in the recent decade. The goal of our project is to offer a set of previously impossible or unanticipated solutions to discover, purchase, track and resell items. This is now viable thanks to the development of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. Three main pillars, discovery, inventory and loyalty, will enable Eligma to become an AI-driven and blockchain-based platform that acts as a personal commerce agent.     ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ THE ELIGMA PLATFORM  The core of the Eligma platform is an AI-driven module that will help users discover best deals for desired products in any online store based on their preferences. It uses several sources of user data to achieve the optimum results. Eligma also connects the offline and online worlds to upgrade the shopping experience and ensure that each user really finds the best deal. Eligma will also introduce a unified shopping account, meaning that a single shopping cart and checkout process will suffice to complete purchases in multiple online stores at once, whereas the platform`s cryptocurrency payment gateway will enable users to pay with cryptocurrencies even if the online stores don’t support them yet.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ ELIGMA INTRODUCTION VIDEO   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ MARKET  The possibility to shop at any time and the ability to compare prices and find better deals are the main reasons consumers rather shop online than in physical stores (KPMG, 2017). Research shows that the online shopping market is growing yearly (in 2016, retail e-commerce sales worldwide amounted to 1.86 trillion U.S. dollars and e-retail revenues are projected to grow to 4.48 trillion U.S. dollars in 2021 (Statista, 2017)) and that people are already losing a lot of time searching for the right product. The offer is vast and the online shopping ecosystem is very dispersed. The second-hand online market is blooming and will probably grow even faster if certain seller and buyer security measures are implemented.  You can find out more about the state of the market in our WHITEPAPER.  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ TEAM  Team is always the heart of the project and our heartful team members, supported by experienced advisors, are set to develop Eligma to serve its users and save them time.  Meet our team and explore their Linkedin profiles here.  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ CROWDSALE INFORMATION     EXPLORE OUR PROJECT WWW.ELIGMA.COM JOIN OUR TELEGRAM COMMUNITY DOWNLOAD OUR WHITEPAPER STAY IN TOUCH BY SUBSCRIBING TO THE ELIGMA NEWSLETTER

ELI tokens.       - 0% for remaining amount of tokens.
